market_regime.implication: Mean-reversion strategies outperform. Breakout/momentum strategies struggle.

watch_list.tuning_source: strategy_configs DB - multiple Sonnet tuning passes on breakout
key_improvements: buffer_pct increased from 0.18% to 0.75% (filters noise breakouts)
lookback_seconds increased from 900s to 3600s (1h reference window)
UTC 2:00 hour filter added (eliminates known loss cluster)

backtest_result.note: breakout_v2 uses same detect() interface as live system. Needs live test period (48-72h monitoring).

watch_list.action_required: Deploy for 72h paper trade monitoring before promoting to full live status

failure_analysis.primary_issue: RSI < 35 AND 2+ consecutive volume spikes required simultaneously
failure_analysis.joint_probability: ~1.5% â†’ too rare for useful trading
failure_analysis.secondary_issue: price_distance_ratio < 0.05 (within 5% of VWMA) adds third condition

failure_analysis.primary_issue: breakout_threshold=0.015 (1.5%) is too large for 5-minute crypto data
failure_analysis.breakout_threshold_note: BTC needs a 1.5% move in 5min to trigger = very rare in ranging market
failure_analysis.secondary_issue: volume_multiplier=1.8 AND min_volume_bars=3 = 3 consecutive volume surge bars needed
failure_analysis.tertiary_issue: volatility_percentile=15 (must be in bottom 15% volatility) further restricts

strategies.name: bb_squeeze
strategies.note: Best paper WR. Key finding: band_width_pct >= 0.5% correlates with wins

strategies.name: momentum
strategies.note: CONFLICT: paper trades positive but strategy_scores below threshold. Re-evaluate in 24h. Config: window=180s, up_pct=0.8

strategies.name: reversal
strategies.note: BORDERLINE. Paper trades show decent WR. Config: lookback=900s, bounce_pct=0.55. Re-evaluate in 24h.

strategies.name: candle_patterns
strategies.note: Highest signal volume (6600/day). Acceptable WR but negative pnl.

strategies.name: rsi_divergence
strategies.note: SELL signals failing (35.3% WR). BUY signals decent (44.5%). Disable SELL in ranging regime.

strategies.name: support_resistance
strategies.note: High volume (6434 signals/day). WR acceptable but pnl negative.

strategies.name: vwap_reversion
strategies.note: CRITICAL: Signals firing at 0.4% deviation but config says 1.2%. ENV VAR mismatch suspected. Higher deviation (>=0.5%) shows better WR (41.6% vs 37.5%).

strategies.name: breakout
strategies.note: Clearly below 35% WR in strategy_scores. breakout_v2.py is replacement candidate.

bb_squeeze.expected_impact: Reduce signals 30%, improve WR from 45% to estimated 50-55%

momentum.finding: Actual signals trigger at 0.65-0.78% change_pct (below 0.8% config)
momentum.expected_impact: Reduce signals 40%, improve WR from 41% to estimated 48-52%

reversal.finding: reject_pct not predictive of outcome (0.35-0.69% range shows similar WR)
reversal.recommended_change: Add volume confirmation: require volume > avg*1.2 at reversal point
reversal.expected_impact: Filter ~20% of signals, improve WR selectivity

librarian_requests.reason: Adjuster cannot use Librarian research without this file. Currently falling back to DB directly.

librarian_requests.request: Evaluate strategy_025 and strategy_023 parameter tuning
librarian_requests.reason: Both generated by Opus for current regime but thresholds too restrictive. Tune and add to library.
All 8 live strategies showing negative Sharpe. Need mean-reversion candidates designed for 0.1-0.5% tick range.
